summary: The diff fully implements REQ-8. A Zustand-based `useSearch` hook shares search state globally between the Header and ProductGrid. The Header has a centered search input with a clear button near the hamburger menu, styled to match the existing dark/light mode theme and responsive on mobile/desktop. ProductGrid filters the three hardcoded products case-insensitively and shows a 'No products found' message with an icon when no matches exist. All acceptance criteria appear to be met.

hallucinated_features.description: A result count summary line ('Showing results for X â€” N products found') is displayed in the ProductGrid header when a search query is active.
hallucinated_features.reason: This informational status text was not requested in REQ-8 or its acceptance criteria, though it is a minor additive UI detail.

hallucinated_features.description: The 'No products found' empty state includes a hint suggesting 'Try searching for Foundation, Lip Gloss, or Eyeliner'.
hallucinated_features.reason: The spec only requires a friendly No products found message; the specific hint text was not mentioned in the requirements.
